function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Manual design/redesign of physical spaces in response to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of inefficient and ineffective social distancing measures","Mitigation":"Implement automated solutions for optimal design of physical spaces with social distancing constraints","Technologies":"Automation, simulation, and optimization software","People":"Designers, decision makers","Owner":"Technology developers"},{"Description":"Ad-hoc methodology for arranging physical spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of overlooking crucial physical constraints for disease mitigation","Mitigation":"Utilize a systematic solution for efficiently arranging physical spaces with given constraints","Technologies":"Systematic design methodology and automation tools","People":"Designers, decision makers","Owner":"Technology developers"},{"Description":"Lack of efficient utilization of proposed solution","Impact":"Missed opportunity for implementing effective social distancing measures in physical spaces","Mitigation":"Develop an easy-to-use, user-friendly web platform for practical implementation of the solution","Technologies":"Web-based platform, user interface design","People":"Designers, decision makers","Owner":"Technology developers"}]}
